title: White Sands National Monument: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved       You Make a Difference National parks prove to be inspirational to those who visit them. They inspire visitors to explore other parks, to learn about local and national history, to tell their friends, and quite often to get involved themselves.  Public support is critical to the management of National Park Service lands and we thank you for your support both past, present, and in the future.   Getting Involved There are many ways in which you can get involved and show your support for your favorite park. For more information on supporting the park of your choice, visit the Get Involved page on the National Park Services website.   At White Sands, you can:     Become a volunteer Make a purchase in our park store or gift shop Observe the principles outlined in our Leave No Trace program Become a member of our cooperating association Explore career opportunities with the NPS Make a monetary donation    Â       Help Us Celebrate the NPS Centennial The National Park Service will celebrate it's 100th birthday in 2016. See what all the excitement is about!
